text: There) in the Garden (they pass from hand to hand a cup) of wine (wherein is neither vanity) stomach-ache because of drinking it (nor cause of sin) from drinking it; it is also said that " vanity " means: falsehood and oaths, and " cause of sin " means: abusing and lying to each other, which means: in the Garden there is neither falsehood and oaths nor abuse and lying.
